name: Spirit Realm (itch) (jtrev23)
description:
Lost in an unknown realm. A spirit recently awakes in the realm of the dead with no memories of her past. She soon encounters a fairy who claims to be able to help. Eager to retrieve her lost memories, the spirit begins a quest to retrieve the orbs of power so that the fairy may restore the spirit's lost memories. 

Spirit Realm was the first game I made back in 2014 for the 2014 Indie Game Maker Contest by Degica. It is a challenging action-platformer that while graphically challenged, is a really fun game to play.
